page.title: 18A Typical Family Weekend.
page.content: _Party'.My sister and her friends went to a party at Welshpool Town Hall. Saturday was another hectic,and busy day.My sister had to be in Welshpool by 8.15a.m.She occasionaly manages to get some part-time work in a cafe.I travelled down with my siter and mother.I was meeting my fellow Brownies and Guides for a special fun- day.Luckily,it was a fine,hot afternoon and everyone seemed to have a pleasant day. Becouse my father is self-employed, and there is always plenty of work on the farm,he is usually busy at the weekend.When I arrived home,Garry and my father had filled in the foundations in our new back kitchen. On Saturday evening the whole family remained at home,watching T.V. On Sunday morning I walked to a near by Chapel for Sunday School.
